Author: pothosgonerogue
Text: It was hard. At Applebee’s I just got a few sides and a small piece of salmon on some “build your own” dish (like choose your sides not get bombarded with a hint pile of fries). At the wings place I just panicked and ate off other peoples plates bc my family over orders food. I just said I needed more time to figure it out then never ordered 😂

Author: grumpygrumbles
Text: lol i was looking at my fave restaurants menus because my sister and i are supposed to get dinner before an event tonight and I’m like ummmm all the food I ate in recovery last year (when I was avoiding calorie counting) are like 2-4x what i’m eating in a day now   idk how i’m either going to find something small or NOT binge on a bigger meal
